pu.pi.util

Class TLocal<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • pu.pi.util.TLocal<E>

  • public class TLocal<E>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class works similar to the standard ThreadLocal but with global control. All variables owned by individual threads can be accessed globally. Author: xiaoxing Date: 4/06/13
